data.title: Birmingham Airport Website
data.meta_description: Get all the information you need about the airport check-in process here including terminal and desk information.
data.text:
Check-In Times

We work hard to make the check-in process as fast as possible, but at peak times, it may take longer than expected. To ensure a smooth and speedy check-in, please make sure you have all your required documentation to board your flight.

Your check-in time can be usually found on your boarding card, however please check with your airline for the precise time for your flight.

Once you're checked in and through security, while you wait to board your flight, enjoy a meal in one of our restaurants or do some shopping in one of our stores.

Terminal and Airline information

Birmingham Airport operates a single terminal for all arriving and departing flights.

Airline and handling agent desks are all on the ground floor of the check-in halls. Self-service check-in kiosks (only available for some airlines) on the ground and first floors of the check-in halls.

Your airline check in desk

There is wayfinding when you get to the airport, to find the right desk for your airline, see below:

Zone A for Jet2

Zone D for Emirates

Zones B & C for all other airlines
